message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, and it's well worth the price.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000 for it. Please let me know if this is possible.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to $9,250 for the product.  It's truly a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll find it well worth the investment. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and am willing to go up to $9,100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response.
